questions.title: Question 10
choices: Exactly two spaces are matched, but only if they occur directly after a period (.) and before an upper case letter.
At least two spaces are matched, but only if they occur directly before a period (.) and after an upper case letter.
Exactly two spaces are matched, but only if they occur directly after a period (.) and before a lower case letter.
At least two spaces are matched, but only if they occur directly after a period (.) and before an upper case letter.
answers: At least two spaces are matched, but only if they occur directly after a period (.) and before an upper case letter.
